id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS THAT HAVE LINEIDX 5 AS PARENTS

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent (6,a)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS IN WHILE LOOP

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent* (w,a)

id.comment: SELECT ALL READ VARIABLES

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select v such that Modifies (r,v)

id.comment: SELECT IF LOOPS THAT HAS ASSIGNMENTS

query.querystr: assign a; if i; Select a such that Parent* (i,a)

id.comment: SELECT WHILE LOOPS THAT HAS PRINTS

query.querystr: print p; while w; Select p such that Parent (w,p)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS IN WHILE LOOP

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent (w,a)

id.comment: SELECT WHILE LOOPS THAT HAS PRINTS

query.querystr: print p; while w; Select p such that Parent* (w,p)

id.comment: SELECT VARIABLES MODIFIED IN LINE 7

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies (10,v)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS WITH row IN RHS

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a( _ , _"row"_)

id.comment: SELECT ALL STATEMENTS THAT MODIFIES col

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies (_,"col")

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS WHERE LHS = eig

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a( "eig" , _ )

id.comment: SELECT IF LOOPS THAT HAS ASSIGNMENT middle = middle + 5

query.querystr: assign a; if i; Select i such that Parent (i,a) pattern a ("middle","middle+5")

id.comment: SELECT ALL WHILE LOOPS THAT HAS AN ASSIGNMENT WITH middle IN RHS

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select w such that Parent (w,a) pattern a ( _ , _"middle"_)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS IN IF LOOPS THAT HAS row IN LHS AND row IN RHS

query.querystr: assign a; if i; Select i such that Parent* (i,a) pattern a ( "row" , _"row"_)

id.comment: SELECT IF LOOPS THAT HAS AN ASSIGNMENT WITH LHS = row AND RHS HAS col

query.querystr: assign a; if i; Select i such that Parent(i,a) pattern a ("row",_"col"_)

id.comment: SELECT VARIABLES THAT ARE MODIFIED THAT HAS col IN RHS EXPRESSION

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select v such that Modifies (a,v) pattern a (_,_"col"_)

id.comment: SELECT VARIABLE COL

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Modifies (a,v) pattern a ("col", _)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS WHERE LHS = middle and rhs = row

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a( "middle", "row" )

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS THAT MODIFIES row AND HAS row IN RHS EXPRESSION

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select a such that Modifies (a,"row") pattern a (_,_"row"_)

id.comment: SELECT ASSIGNMENTS IN WHILE LOOP THAT HAS middle IN RHS

query.querystr: assign a; while w; Select a such that Parent* (w,a) pattern a ( _ , _"middle"_)

id.comment: SELECT ALL ASSIGNMENTS THAT HAS AN ASSIGNMENT WITH middle IN LHS THAT ARE IN IF LOOPS

query.querystr: assign a; if i; Select a such that Parent (i,a) pattern a ("middle", _)
